overview:
“Paddy Deshmukh holds more than 16 years of experience in product development. Most recently, he managed products at YellowPages.com. Prior to Yellowpages.com, Mr. Deshmukh was at OneBuild where he developed enterprise software products for large manufacturing companies. Mr. Deshmukh has delivered solutions in high-tech, wireless and electric utilities industries.

Earlier in his career, Mr. Deshmukh worked at Sabre (associated with American Airlines) where he developed Operations Research based flight scheduling optimization applications and implemented Internet based air-travel reservation systems for airlines around the globe.” (Source: Weblistic)
